contents.text: Thank you for calling SV Angel, San Francisco’s leading angel investment firm.
If you are a portfolio company needing support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a business development specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect with a business development specialist to explore partnership opportunities for my portfolio company.
I need guidance on forging strategic partnerships to grow my veteran-led portfolio company.
I need to discuss optimizing our platform’s API integration strategy to accelerate user acquisition.
I need guidance on business development for my portfolio company.
I need assistance developing strategic partnerships and go-to-market channels for our photonic sensor portfolio company.

contents.text: For financing and M&A advice, press 2.
One moment please; connecting you to our financing and M&A team.

navigationGoals: Get targeted financing options and M&A advice for my startup’s next growth stage.
I want advice on financing options and M&A strategy for my veteran-owned business.
I’m seeking advice on Series B valuation modeling and identifying strategic acquisition targets.
I need advice on financing options and possible mergers for my business.
I’m seeking guidance on structuring our Series A financing round and evaluating potential M&A offers for our quantum computing spin-out.

contents.text: If you are interested in presenting a new investment opportunity, press 2.
To submit a pitch deck, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer your pitch to our investments team.

navigationGoals: Submit my pitch deck for the investments team’s prompt review.
I’d like to submit my pitch deck for my cybersecurity startup to secure angel investment.
I’d like to submit my AI-driven SaaS startup’s pitch deck for seed funding review.
I want to submit my pitch deck for a new investment opportunity.
I’d like to submit my pitch deck for a seed-stage investment in our superconducting materials startup opportunity.

contents.text: Please hold and we’ll connect you to an SV Angel representative.

navigationGoals: Clarify SV Angel’s general investment criteria and next steps before proceeding.
I have a question about SV Angel’s veteran-focused support and mentorship programs.
I have questions about SV Angel’s investment thesis and portfolio performance metrics.
I have a general question and need to speak with an SV Angel representative.
I have questions about internship opportunities or potential research collaborations with SV Angel.
